channel.title: Command suggestions please?
channel.description:
im making a command which gives three random items 1 platebody 2 shield 3 platelegs
if i were to make a command, say ::armour would i need something like public static int plate public static int sheilds public static int legs
this way i can add 3 different random items with the one command by putting something like this as my command..
[code] if (command.startsWith("armour")) { addItem(Item.plate(), 1); addItem(Item.legs(), 1); addItem(Item.shields(), 1); } [/code]
would something like that work?

@Trent1 wrote:

ahk and the second bit i would add after

correct?

Read full topic

item.title: Command suggestions please?
item.dc:creator: @JaydenD12 JaydenD12
item.description:
@JaydenD12 wrote:

public int[] plateBody = {platebody ids..}; public int[] shields = {shield ids..}; public int[] plateLegs = {leg ids..};

^ Make sure you seperate the ids with a comma.

public int randomPlateBodys() 
{
	return plateBody[(int) (Math.random() * plateBody.length)];
}
public int randomShields() 
{
	return shields[(int) (Math.random() * shields.length)];
}
public int randomPlateLegs() 
{
	return plateLegs[(int) (Math.random() * plateLegs.length)];
}
if (command.startsWith("armour")) 
{
	addItem(randomPlateBodys(), 1);
	addItem(randomShields(), 1);
	addItem(randomPlateLegs(), 1);
}

Should work quite nicely.

Read full topic

item.title: Command suggestions please?
item.dc:creator: @Trent1 Trent!!
item.description:
@Trent1 wrote:

im making a command which gives three random items
1 platebody
2 shield
3 platelegs

if i were to make a command, say
::armour
would i need something like
public static int plate
public static int sheilds
public static int legs

this way i can add 3 different random items with the one command
by putting something like this as my command…

        if (command.startsWith("armour")) {
            addItem(Item.plate(), 1);
            addItem(Item.legs(), 1);
            addItem(Item.shields(), 1);
        }

would something like that work?

Read full topic
